H0.text: What is the name of the seven-branched candelabra used in the Jewish religion. Ner Tamid

H1.text: What is the name of the seven-branched candelabra used in the Jewish religion. Shabbat Lamp

H2.text: What is the name of the seven-branched candelabra used in the Jewish religion. Havdalah Candle

H3.text: What is the name of the seven-branched candelabra used in the Jewish religion. Menorah

A4.text: Temple menorah, a seven-branched candelabrum used in the Tabernacle, the Temple in Jerusalem, and synagogues
